title: Forgot to do my homework, is it cheating if I don't tell my teacher? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: eunus from Germany uh so I know there's this thing with which students don't like homework so I'm a I'm rather busy and a lot of the times I Forget homework or I skip it deliberately because otherwise I'll get like four hours of sleep now the thing is if I skip must I tell the teacher like some cases the the teacher ask ask anyone didn't do it in other cases the the teacher didn't doesn't ask at all and in other cases the teacher the the teacher himself says if you didn't do it just don't tell no so no if I don't tell this will I will get a better grade that I deserve so isn't this cheating um like if if your teacher does not ask Clinton used to say don't ask don't tell so the policy remains if you're negligent if you're lazy and you did not do your homework you don't have to carry a flag all around the school and say I didn't do my homework I'm lazy I'm this I'm that no if the teacher asks did you do your homework you say no I didn't if they don't ask then you don't have to sayd
